vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ This name is used for:
1) round
1a) a round district (environs of the Jordan valley)
1b) a round loaf (of bread)
1c) a round weight, talent (of gold, silver, bronze, iron)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   distrito; (b)   disco redondo; (c)   talento; peso de aproximadamente 30 kilogramos, usado para realizar pagos; equivalente a 3000 siclos o 60 minas
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 圓形的
1a) 圓形的區域 (約旦河山谷的周邊)
1b) 圓形的麵包
1c) 圓形的砝碼, 或是特別的重量單位"他連得",通常指金或銀的重量
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 圆形的
1a) 圆形的区域 (约旦河山谷的周边)
1b) 圆形的面包
1c) 圆形的砝码, 或是特别的重量单位"他连得",通常指金或银的重量

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) round
1a) a round district (environs of the Jordan valley)
1b) a round loaf (of bread)
1c) a round weight, talent (of gold, silver, bronze, iron)
Aramaic equivalent: kik.ker (כִּכֵּר "talent" H3604)
§ 1) round
1a) a round district (environs of the Jordan valley)
1b) a round loaf (of bread)
1c) a round weight, talent (of gold, silver, bronze, iron)
